 Promotion for New Prepaid Subscribers in 04/2013 A- Program 1: 1. Eligibility: Applicable for 0đ starter kits which are l MobiCard , MobiZone , and MobiQ kits activate and top up on 14,16,18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 30 April. Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits and others switch to Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 (involved in inactivated and activated) DO NOT allow to join. 2. Benefits: a. The first time top up promotion: bonus 100% scratch card value, details: Top-up card Bonus KM2 credit KM3 credit VND 5.000 VND 2500 VND 2500 VND 10.000 VND 5.000 VND 5.000 VND 20.000 VND 10.000 VND 10.000 VND 30.000 VND 15.000 VND 15.000 VND 50.000 VND 25.000 VND 25.000 VND 100.000 VND 50.000 VND 50.000 VND 200.000 VND 100.000 VND 100.000 VND 300.000 VND 150.000 VND 150.000 VND 500.000 VND 250.000 VND 250.000 b. Promotion for next 5 top up time (2-6): bonus 50% scratch card value, Top-up card Bonus KM2 credit (25%) KM3 credit (25%) VND 5.000 VND 1.250 VND 1.250 VND 10.000 VND 2.500 VND 2.500 VND 20.000 VND 5.000 VND 5.000 VND 30.000 VND 7.500 VND 7.500 VND 50.000 VND 12.500 VND 12.500 VND 100.000 VND 25.000 VND 25.000 VND 200.000 VND 50.000 VND 50.000 VND 300.000 VND 75.000 VND 75.000 VND 500.000 VND 125.000 VND 125.000 MobiCard, MobiZone: days of use will be depended on top-up value Minimum days of use: 15 days. Top up before 30/06/2013 in order to get benefits of this promotion. B- Program 2: 1. Eligibility: Applicable for Starter kits, which was sold before 2013 and have main balance > VND 25.000 (enough to deduct the activation fee), activate on 14,16,18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 30 April Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits and others switch to Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 (involved in inactivated and activated) DO NOT allow to join. 2. Benefits a . Active Promotion: Bonus 100% left value on main balance b. Promotion for first 5 top up time: Bonus 50% scratch card value Top-up card Bonus KM2 credit (25%) KM3 credit (25%) VND 5.000 VND 1.250 VND 1.250 VND 10.000 VND 2.500 VND 2.500 VND 20.000 VND 5.000 VND 5.000 VND 30.000 VND 7.500 VND 7.500 VND 50.000 VND 12.500 VND 12.500 VND 100.000 VND 25.000 VND 25.000 VND 200.000 VND 50.000 VND 50.000 VND 300.000 VND 75.000 VND 75.000 VND 500.000 VND 125.000 VND 125.000 MobiCard, MobiZone: days of use will be depended on top-up value Minimum days of use: 15 days. Top up before 30/06/2013 in order to get benefits of this promotion. Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 &#46608;&#45716; Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 &#47196; &#48320;&#44221;&#54624; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; (&#44060;&#53685;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#48143; &#50500;&#51649; &#50504; &#44060;&#53685;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#54364;&#54632;&#54620;&#45796;) &#51201;&#50857;&#51060; &#50504; &#46108;&#45796; . 2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#54812;&#53469; : a. &#44060;&#53685;&#49884; &#54812;&#53469; : &#51452;&#44228;&#51221;&#51032; &#51092;&#50529;&#51032; 100% &#47484; &#51452;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796;. b. &#45796;&#51020;&#50640; 5 &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#52649;&#51204;&#49884; &#54812;&#53469; : ( &#52649;&#52380;&#52852;&#46300; 2-6): &#52649;&#51204;&#49884; &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#51032; &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201;&#51032; 50% &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796;. &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201; &#52649;&#51204;&#49884; &#54812;&#53469;&#44592;&#51456; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44228;&#51221; 2 &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44228;&#51221; 3 5.000 &#46041; 1.250 &#46041; 1.250 &#46041; 10.000 &#46041; 2.500 &#46041; 2.500&#46041; 20.000 &#46041; 5.000 &#46041; 5.000 &#46041; 30.000&#46041; 7.500 &#46041; 7.500&#46041; 50.000&#46041; 12.500&#46041; 12.500&#46041; 100.000 &#46041; 25.000&#46041; 25.000&#46041; 200.000&#46041; 50.000&#46041; 50.000&#46041; 300.000&#46041; 75.000&#46041; 75.000&#46041; 500.000&#46041; 125.000&#46041; 125.000&#46041; MobiCard, MobiZone&#51064; &#44221;&#50864; &#51060;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036;&#51008; &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#44228;&#49328;&#46108;&#45796; . &#52572;&#49548; &#51032; &#51060;&#50857;&#51068;&#49688;:15&#51068; &#50948; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#44592; &#50948;&#54644; 2013 &#45380; 06 &#50900; 30 &#51068; &#51204;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. C- &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#44592;&#44036; : 2013 &#45380; 04 &#50900; 14 &#51068; &#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 04 &#50900; 30 &#51068; &#44620;&#51648; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6035;&#6085;&#6017;&#6082; 04/2013 A- &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 1&#6102; 1. &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102;
